name.japanese: スリラーバーク海賊団

members.joinCircumstances: Founder and leader of the crew

members.role: Commander of Soldier Zombies and General Zombies
Commander of Wild Zombies and Surprise Zombies
Zombie Creator and Member of Mysterious Four
members.joinCircumstances: Recruited as the crew's doctor and zombie surgeon
Zombie created by Hogback and animated by Moria's shadows

keyMoments.title: Mysterious Four Strategic Meeting
keyMoments.description: Hogback, Absalom, and Perona convene to discuss how to handle the Straw Hat Pirates' invasion of Thriller Bark.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the organizational structure and coordination of the Thriller Bark Pirates' leadership.

keyMoments.title: Absalom's Attack on Nami
keyMoments.description: Absalom uses his Devil Fruit powers to assault Nami, establishing the crew's villainous nature and personal stakes in the conflict.
keyMoments.significance: Escalates the conflict between the Straw Hats and Thriller Bark Pirates to a personal level.

keyMoments.title: Surprise Zombies Deployed
keyMoments.description: The Surprise Zombies, under Perona's command, attack Nami, Usopp, and Chopper in Hogback's mansion.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's use of zombie forces to defend their territory.

ships.description: A massive island-sized ship that serves as both the crew's vessel and their base of operations.

bases.description: The crew's main base is Thriller Bark itself, a floating island in the Florian Triangle.

jollyRoger.description: A horned skull with bat wings

keyMoments.title: Crew Splits to Explore Thriller Bark
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat Pirates continue their separated exploration of Thriller Bark, with Luffy's group landing on the main island while Nami's trio remains trapped in Hogback's mansion.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew working in divided groups to tackle different threats on Thriller Bark.

keyMoments.title: Nami Attacked by Absalom
keyMoments.description: Nami is assaulted by Absalom, putting her in serious danger and requiring her crewmates' protection.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's vulnerability when separated and raises the personal stakes of the conflict.

keyMoments.title: Discover Zombie Weakness to Fire
keyMoments.description: Usopp discovers that the Thriller Bark zombies fear fire, providing a tactical advantage.
keyMoments.significance: Gives the Straw Hats a weapon to use against the zombie army.

ships.description: The Straw Hats' second ship, built by Franky after the Going Merry's destruction.

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it
